metadata.title: CVE-2022-1921 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Integer overflow in avidemux element in gst_avi_demux_invert function which allows a heap overwrite while parsing avi files. Potential for arbitrary code execution through heap overwrite.

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-good1.0 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
